caption: This photograph depicts a polluted wetland area. The water is murky and scattered with a range of detritus, including discarded items like a tire, various plastic and foam containers, papers, other smaller pieces of random refuse, and partially submerged reeds and plants. The background shows a dense growth of tall, dark green reeds extending to the horizon under a pale sky, suggesting an otherwise natural and possibly expansive marshland setting suffering from significant pollution. The overall mood of the scene is somewhat desolate and reflects a negative human impact on a natural environment.
title: Middletown dump spills over into salt marsh creek
